mapper.sql: id, openId, telephone, wxnumber, registertime, subcribe, wxnickname, sex, wxlanguage, city, province, country, headImgUrl, subscribeTime, unionId, remark, groupId, createTime, updateTime, deleted, version
mapper.select: select u.* from t_user_hall uh left join t_user u on uh.user_id = u.id where uh.hall_id = #{hallId}
select u.* from t_user_hall uh left join t_user u on uh.user_id = u.id where uh.hall_id = #{hallId} and u.wxnickname like CONCAT('%',#{nickName},'%')
mapper.update:
update t_user
subcribe = #{subcribe,jdbcType=TINYINT},
subscribetime = #{subscribetime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into t_user (id, openId, telephone, wxnumber, registertime, subcribe, wxnickname, sex, wxlanguage, city, province, country, headImgUrl, subscribeTime, unionId, remark, groupId, createTime, updateTime, deleted, version ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wxnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{subcribe,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{wxnickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{wxlanguage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headimgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subscribetime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
